verses.verse: And when the people <WH5971> complained <WH596> <WH8693>, it displeased <WH7451> <WH241> the YY <WH3068>: and the YY <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> it; and his anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799>; and the fire <WH784> of the YY <WH3068> burnt <WH1197> <WH8799> among them, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> them that were in the uttermost parts <WH7097> of the camp <WH4264>.
And the people <WH5971> cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>; and when Mosheh <WH4872> prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> unto the YY <WH3068>, the fire <WH784> was quenched <WH8257> <WH8799>.
And he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the <WH1931> place <WH4725> Taberah <WH8404>: because the fire <WH784> of the YY <WH3068> burnt <WH1197> <WH8804> among them.

And the mixt multitude <WH628> that was among <WH7130> them fell a lusting <WH183> <WH8694> <WH8378>: and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> also wept <WH1058> <WH8799> again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who shall give us flesh <WH1320> to eat <WH398> <WH8686> ?

We remember <WH2142> <WH8804> the fish <WH1710>, which we did eat <WH398> <WH8799> in Egypt <WH4714> freely <WH2600>; the cucumbers <WH7180>, and the melons <WH20>, and the leeks <WH2682>, and the onions <WH1211>, and the garlick <WH7762>:
But now our soul <WH5315> is dried away <WH3002>: there is nothing at all, beside <WH1115> this manna <WH4478>, before our eyes <WH5869>.
And the manna <WH4478> was as coriander <WH1407> seed <WH2233>, and the colour <WH5869> thereof as the colour <WH5869> of bdellium <WH916>.

And the people <WH5971> went about <WH7751> <WH8804>, and gathered <WH3950> <WH8804> it, and ground <WH2912> <WH8804> it in mills <WH7347>, or beat <WH1743> <WH8804> it in a mortar <WH4085>, and baked <WH1310> <WH8765> it in pans <WH6517>, and made <WH6213> <WH8804> cakes <WH5692> of it: and the taste <WH2940> of it was as the taste <WH2940> of fresh <WH3955> oil <WH8081>.
And when the dew <WH2919> fell <WH3381> <WH8800> upon the camp <WH4264> in the night <WH3915>, the manna <WH4478> fell <WH3381> <WH8799> upon it.

Then Mosheh <WH4872> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> weep <WH1058> <WH8802> throughout their families <WH4940>, every man <WH376> in the door <WH6607> of his tent <WH168>: and the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> greatly <WH3966>; Mosheh <WH4872> also was displeased <WH7489> <WH8804> <WH5869>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, Wherefore hast thou afflicted <WH7489> <WH8689> thy servant <WH5650>? and wherefore have I not found <WH4672> <WH8804> favour <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, that thou layest <WH7760> <WH8800> the burden <WH4853> of all this people <WH5971> upon me?

Have I conceived <WH2029> <WH8804> all this people <WH5971>? have I begotten <WH3205> <WH8804> them, that thou shouldest say <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Carry <WH5375> <WH8798> them in thy bosom <WH2436>, as a nursing father <WH539> <WH8802> beareth <WH5375> <WH8799> the sucking child <WH3243> <WH8802>, unto the land <WH127> which thou swarest <WH7650> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1> ?

Whence <WH370> should I have flesh <WH1320> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> unto all this people <WH5971>? for they weep <WH1058> <WH8799> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Give <WH5414> <WH8798> us flesh <WH1320>, that we may eat <WH398> <WH8799>.
I am not able <WH3201> <WH8799> to bear <WH5375> <WH8800> all this people <WH5971> alone <WH905>, because it is too heavy <WH3515> for me.

And if thou deal <WH6213> <WH8802> thus with me, kill <WH2026> <WH8798> me, I pray thee, out of hand <WH2026> <WH8800>, if I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> favour <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>; and let me not see <WH7200> <WH8799> my wretchedness <WH7451>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Gater <WH622> <WH8798> unto me seventy <WH7657> men <WH376> of the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whom thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> to be the elders <WH2205> of the people <WH5971>, and officers <WH7860> <WH8802> over them; and bring <WH3947> <WH8804> them unto the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, that they may stand <WH3320> <WH8694> there with thee.

And I will come down <WH3381> <WH8804> and talk <WH1696> <WH8765> with thee there: and I will take <WH680> <WH8804> of the spirit <WH7307> which is upon thee, and will put <WH7760> <WH8804> it upon them; and they shall bear <WH5375> <WH8804> the burden <WH4853> of the people <WH5971> with thee, that thou bear <WH5375> <WH8799> it not thyself alone.

And say <WH559> <WH8799> thou unto the people <WH5971>, Sanctify <WH6942> <WH8690> yourselves against to morrow <WH4279>, and ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> flesh <WH1320>: for ye have wept <WH1058> <WH8804> in the ears <WH241> of the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Who shall give us flesh <WH1320> to eat <WH398> <WH8686>? for it was well <WH2895> <WH8804> with us in Egypt <WH4714>: therefore the YY <WH3068> will give <WH5414> <WH8804> you flesh <WH1320>, and ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8804>.
Ye shall not eat <WH398> <WH8799> one <WH259> day <WH3117>, nor two days <WH3117>, nor five <WH2568> days <WH3117>, neither ten <WH6235> days <WH3117>, nor twenty <WH6242> days <WH3117>;

But even a whole month <WH2320> <WH3117>, until it come out <WH3318> <WH8799> at your nostrils <WH639>, and it be loathsome <WH2214> unto you: because <WH3282> that ye have despised <WH3988> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> which is among <WH7130> you, and have wept <WH1058> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Why came we forth <WH3318> <WH8804> out of Egypt <WH4714> ?

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, The people <WH5971>, among <WH7130> whom I am, are six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> footmen <WH7273>; and thou hast said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> them flesh <WH1320>, that they may eat <WH398> <WH8804> a whole <WH3117> month <WH2320>.

Shall the flocks <WH6629> and the herds <WH1241> be slain <WH7819> <WH8735> for them, to suffice <WH4672> <WH8804> them? or shall all the fish <WH1709> of the sea <WH3220> be gathered together <WH622> <WH8735> for them, to suffice <WH4672> <WH8804> them?

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Is the YY'S <WH3068> hand <WH3027> waxed short <WH7114> <WH8799>? thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8799> now whether my word <WH1697> shall come to pass <WH7136> <WH8799> unto thee or not.

And Mosheh <WH4872> went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and told <WH1696> <WH8762> the people <WH5971> the words <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, and gathered <WH622> <WH8799> the seventy <WH7657> men <WH376> of the elders <WH2205> of the people <WH5971>, and set <WH5975> <WH8686> them round about <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH168>.

And the YY <WH3068> came down <WH3381> <WH8799> in a cloud <WH6051>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto him, and took <WH680> <WH8686> of the spirit <WH7307> that was upon him, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> it unto the seventy <WH7657> elders <WH2205> <WH376>: and it came to pass, that, when the spirit <WH7307> rested <WH5117> <WH8800> upon them, they prophesied <WH5012> <WH8691>, and did not cease <WH3254> <WH8804>.

But there remained <WH7604> <WH8735> two <WH8147> of the men <WH582> in the camp <WH4264>, the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Eldad <WH419>, and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH8145> Medad <WH4312>: and the spirit <WH7307> rested <WH5117> <WH8799> upon them; and they were of them that were written <WH3789> <WH8803>, but went not out <WH3318> <WH8804> unto the tabernacle <WH168>: and they prophesied <WH5012> <WH8691> in the camp <WH4264>.

And there ran <WH7323> <WH8799> a young man <WH5288>, and told <WH5046> <WH8686> Mosheh <WH4872>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Eldad <WH419> and Medad <WH4312> do prophesy <WH5012> <WH8693> in the camp <WH4264>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, the servant <WH8334> <WH8764> of Mosheh <WH4872>, one of his young men <WH979>, answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, My lord <WH113> Mosheh <WH4872>, forbid <WH3607> <WH8798> them.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Enviest <WH7065> <WH8764> thou for my sake? would 'Elohim that all the <WH5414> <WH8799> YY'S <WH3068> people <WH5971> were prophets <WH5030>, and that the YY <WH3068> would put <WH5414> <WH8799> his spirit <WH7307> upon them!
And Mosheh <WH4872> gat <WH622> <WH8735> him into the camp <WH4264>, he and the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And there went forth <WH5265> <WH8804> a wind <WH7307> from the YY <WH3068>, and brought <WH1468> <WH8799> quails <WH7958> from the sea <WH3220>, and let them fall <WH5203> <WH8799> by the camp <WH4264>, as it were a day's <WH3117> journey <WH1870> on this side <WH3541>, and as it were a day's <WH3117> journey <WH1870> on the other side <WH3541>, round about <WH5439> the camp <WH4264>, and as it were two cubits <WH520> high upon the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH776>.

And the people <WH5971> stood up <WH6965> <WH8799> all that day <WH3117>, and all that night <WH3915>, and all the next <WH4283> day <WH3117>, and they gathered <WH622> <WH8799> the quails <WH7958>: he that gathered least <WH4591> <WH8688> gathered <WH622> <WH8804> ten <WH6235> homers <WH2563>: and they spread <WH7849> <WH8799> them all abroad <WH7849> <WH8800> for themselves round about <WH5439> the camp <WH4264>.

And while the flesh <WH1320> was yet <WH2962> between their teeth <WH8127>, ere it was chewed <WH3772> <WH8735>, the wrath <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8804> against the people <WH5971>, and the YY <WH3068> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the people <WH5971> with a very <WH3966> great <WH7227> plague <WH4347>.
And he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Kibrothhattaavah <WH6914>: because there they buried <WH6912> <WH8804> the people <WH5971> that lusted <WH183> <WH8693>.
And the people <WH5971> journeyed <WH5265> <WH8804> from Kibrothhattaavah <WH6914> unto Hazeroth <WH2698>; and abode at Hazeroth <WH2698>.
